attributes.action: ensure that NATS and the CAA make no changes to the stack and routing arrangements for Luton and Stansted airports without full consultation that may include a public enquiry to allow all affected parties to present their objections or support.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently NATS and the CAA can realign routes and stacks for aircraft without any form of public consultation. They are considering making changes to increase capacity at Luton and Stansted and allow for the implementation of Terminal 5 at Heathrow. These changes will have a devastating effect on large swathes of Cambridgeshire, Suffolk and Essex. Such changes should be subject to the same planning regime as is required  for building new airports.
